sentences.en: A digital aircraft anti - skid braking controller based on embedded DSP - TMS 320 LF 2407 was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种基于嵌入式DSP芯片TMS320LF2407的数字化飞机防滑刹车控制器.

sentences.en: A multiple - position controller which has three discrete values of output.
sentences.cn: 一种含有三个离散输出值的多位置控制器.

sentences.en: Check list ( quality specification ) has been signed by the controller ( inspector, checker ).
sentences.cn: 检验单 ( 质量说明书 ) 已由管理员 ( 检查员 、 审核人 ) 签字.

sentences.en: Decentralized stabilization controller of region for the systems is designed.
sentences.cn: 给出了该系统的区域的分散镇定控制器的设计.

sentences.en: Kexing Automatic Temperature Controller: designed for blower fan automatic temperature control.
sentences.cn: 详细介绍科星全自动温度控制器: 用于对风机的温度自动控制.

sentences.en: The insulin - dosage rate is set in the electronic controller according to the patient's needs.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素的剂量注射速率,可根据病人的需要在电子控制器中预先制定.

sentences.en: The load current is handled directly by the controller through semiconductor switching devices.
sentences.cn: 负荷电流由调节器通过半导体开关元件直接控制.

sentences.en: The non - bleed controller uses air only when exhausting the line to the controlled device.
sentences.cn: 无放流式调节器只有在通至调节机构的管道排气时才消耗空气.

sentences.en: The programme was rescheduled to 9.30pm by Alan Yentob, controller of BBC1.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司电视一台的主管艾伦·耶恩托布将这个节目改为晚上9点30分播出。

sentences.en: The result of experiment embodied the fine control property of the controller.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明,该控制器有优良的控制性能.

sentences.en: The solid - state controller has an electronic timer which provides an extremely short time base.
sentences.cn: 在固定调节器中,有一只电子定时器,它能提供极小的定时常数.

sentences.en: The value of automatic controller is found in their ability to provide the desired environmental conditions.
sentences.cn: 自动控制器的优越性在于它能提供所需要的环境条件.

sentences.en: This paper presents an adaptive control algorithm —— the Minimum Deviation Advance Controller ( MDA C ).
sentences.cn: 本文介绍一种新的自校正算法——最小偏差超前控制器 ( theMinimum DeviationAdvance Controller,MDAC ).

sentences.en: Tilt Sensitive . Controller can be rotated or rolled from side - to - side.
sentences.cn: 旋转感应装置,控制器可以任意翻转,感应旋转角位移.

sentences.en: Two - way communication is available so that a computer may pull the controller.
sentences.cn: 有 双向 传输,因此计算机可以对控制器定时询问.

words.tran_cn: 可控制的；可管理的；能操纵的
受控制的；受约束的；克制的
控制；管理；抑制；操纵装置
主计员或管理员之职位或任期
控制；约束（control的过去式）；指挥
[船][自]控制器；[计]管理员；[审计][会计]主计长

phrases.tran_cn: 功率控制器；电源控制器
[计]可编程序控制器；[化]可编程调节器
速度控制器；调速器；速率控制器；速度调节手柄
n. 温度控制器，温控仪

trans.tran_cn: 管理者，控制者，（机器的）控制器，（公司的）财务总管
trans.tran_en: A controller is a person who has responsibility for a particular organization or for a particular part of an organization
